verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine! Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine! Heir of salvation, purchase of God, Born of His Spirit, washed in His blood.{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}Perfect submission, all is at rest, I in my Savior am happy and blest: Watching and waiting, looking above, Filled with His goodness, lost in His love.{/lang-eng}
